rd_info.description_en: Recurring Deposit (RD) is a term deposit with monthly contributions. It helps build savings with fixed interest.
rd_info.function: Users deposit a fixed amount every month for a fixed tenure. Interest rates vary by tenure and are compounded quarterly.

products.savings: Savings Account with zero-balance option and debit card.
products.fixed_deposit: Fixed Deposits with competitive rates and auto-renewal.
products.home_loan: Home loans with flexible tenure up to 30 years.
products.gold_loan: Gold loans against pledged gold at attractive interest rates.
products.personal_loan: Unsecured personal loans with quick disbursal.
products.rd: Recurring Deposit to build disciplined savings.
products.investments: Mutual funds, FD, RD and portfolio management services.

en.what_is_rd: RD is a Recurring Deposit where you save a fixed amount monthly and earn interest.
en.how_to_apply_loan: Apply via the web portal or visit any branch. Provide KYC and income documents.

bn.what_is_rd: আরডি একটি রিকারিং ডিপোজিট যেখানে আপনি প্রতি মাসে একটি নির্দিষ্ট পরিমাণ জমা দিন এবং সুদ অর্জন করেন।
bn.how_to_apply_loan: ওয়েব পোর্টাল বা শাখায় আসার মাধ্যমে আবেদন করুন। KYC এবং আয়ের নথি প্রয়োজন।
